thread.title: Acting education secretary says teachers saved him
thread.title_full: Acting education secretary says teachers saved him

title: Acting education secretary says teachers saved him
text: > Top News Acting education secretary says teachers saved him President Barack Obama with Education Secretary Arne Duncan, speaks in the State Dining Room of the White House in Washington, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, during an announcement in which Duncan said he will be stepping down in December after 7 years in the Obama administration. Duncan will be returning to Chicago and Obama has appointed senior Education Department official, John King Jr., left, to oversee the Education Department. (AP Photo/Manuel Balce Ceneta)
